item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 22 Jun 2021
item.description:
1. First releases of dirsp-exchange: auditable variant of Signal Protocol and ProScript-to-OCaml translator
  2. Job offer: 3 year research engineer in static analysis of OCaml programs at Inria Rennes
  3. IRC channels available on libera.chat
  4. Set up OCaml 2.0.0-beta
  5. First release of Jsonxt - a set of JSON parsers and writers
  6. mula 0.1.0, ML's radishal Universal Levenshtein Automata library
  7. New release of mlcuddidl, the OCaml interface to the CUDD BDD library
  8. first release of orf: OCaml Random Forests
